extension.name: ETL particle G5 Owl Carousel (EN)
extension.author: Bertrand Pascal - En Toutes Lettres
extension.description:
Particle "Owl Carousel" for Gantry 5 v3.1 - Template Hydrogen (English version) - Owl Carousel v2.3.4

By RocketTheme - Copy of particle from Helium free template
Adaptation for Hydrogen by En Toutes Lettres (https://www.en-toutes-lettres.fr)

Don't forget to add these 2 lines if not done

@import 'dependencies;'

@import 'etl_owlcarousel';

in your custom CSS file, custom.scss (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)

or create this file and add these 2 lines with your text editor (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)
